Articles.Content:
If anyone who works on the Enhanced Edition Team for updates, when will 1.11 come? I learned from 2019 that, from what I see, they do it in batches of 2 or 3 each, so I presume it'll be 1.11-1.13 or 1.14 in the end of the year?


(Note: This'll also be in the Enhanced Edition Subreddit, /u/DowntownTubleweed (AKA Ziggy's Stupidity) am I.)
